Taylorsville.2700 West Sugar Factory Road (UTA statio:
2700 West Sugar Factory Road (sometimes referred to as simply "2700 West") is a light rail station in the West Jordan, Utah, in the United States, served by the Red Line of the Utah Transit Authority's (UTA) TRAX light rail system. The Red Line provides service from the University of Utah to the Daybreak Community of South Jordan.


== Description ==
The station is located at 8351 South 2700 West and is easily accessible from 2700 West at 8350 South (just north of West Sugar Factory Road).
